name: Adventures of Weeb
description:
I recently came across the executable of the second game I ever made. The first being a Pokemon Tic-Tac-Toe coded in Visual Basic lol .

It's pretty bad and it definitely shows off my audio engineering skills more than it does my game design, which is saying something. Regardless, it's here more of a reminder of how much I've grown rather than a boast of my skill.

DISCLAIMER: None of the art is mine.  I made this a while ago so I have no clue how to find the artists, but I'm pretty sure I got most if not all of the sprites on itchio.  If anyone know the artist for the various assets let me and I'll link to them.

How-to-Play:

First Level

  • WASD: Movement
  • Side Note: Just keep walking. I swear something else happens.

Second Level

  • SPACE: Progress Dialogue
  • WASD: movement
  • SPACE: attack

Third Level

  • SPACE: Jump
  • Side Note: You are meant to die on this level, but see how far you can get
